exceptions.placeholder: *Enter words, one per line or comma-separated, that should NOT be capitalized

seo.whatIsText: Case conversion is the transformation of letters in text between lowercase (small) and uppercase (capital) letters. This tool allows you to quickly format text to the desired style: make all letters lowercase, uppercase, capitalize each word, or apply other formatting rules.
seo.whyNeed: Why do you need case conversion?
seo.whyNeedText: Proper letter case is important for creating quality content. It improves text readability, makes it more professional and compliant with standards. Case conversion is often required when preparing headlines, processing data, formatting lists, or correcting texts written with rule violations.
seo.whatOptions: What case conversion options are available?
seo.whatOptionsText: The tool supports five main modes: converting all letters to lowercase, converting to uppercase, capitalizing each word (with the ability to specify exceptions), capitalizing only the first letter, and automatically capitalizing letters after periods and exclamation or question marks.
seo.howExceptionsText: When selecting "Capitalize Each Word" mode, you can specify exception words that should remain lowercase. This is useful for prepositions, conjunctions, and articles in titles. Simply enter the needed words in the exceptions field — one per line or comma-separated.
seo.whoUseful: Who will find this tool useful?
seo.whoUsefulText: The tool will be useful for copywriters, editors, marketers, students, and anyone working with text. It saves time when formatting headlines, correcting case in large volumes of text, and bringing content to a uniform appearance.

seo.title: Online Text Transliteration - Wekey Tools
seo.description: Fast Cyrillic to Latin conversion online. Transliteration with additional options: space replacement, case conversion, text cleanup.
seo.keywords: transliteration, cyrillic to latin, online transliteration, letter conversion, text conversion
seo.ogDescription: Convert Cyrillic text to Latin letters with additional formatting options

whatIsTransliteration.title: What is transliteration?
whatIsTransliteration.text: Transliteration is the process of replacing letters of one alphabet with symbols of another, while preserving the pronunciation of the word. Most often, it refers to converting Cyrillic letters to Latin. This method of writing allows you to use names, titles, or entire texts where Cyrillic is unavailable or inconvenient. The online Wekey Tools service simplifies this process by automatically converting text to transliteration.

whyNeeded.title: Why is transliteration needed?
whyNeeded.text: Transliteration is necessary in various fields. It's used when creating domain names, URLs, and usernames, in filling out international forms and documents, helps adapt content for search engines and social networks. For marketing and SEO specialists, transliteration is especially useful: it makes links understandable and readable, improving the perception of the site by users and search engines.

howItWorks.title: How does the "Transliteration" tool work?
howItWorks.text: The Wekey Tools automatically converts each Cyrillic letter to its Latin equivalent according to standard rules. You just need to paste text into the input field and click the "Show Result" button. If necessary, you can use additional options: change letter case, replace spaces with dashes, remove extra characters or spaces. But even if you don't select any rules, the tool will still produce a correct result.

whatTexts.title: What texts can be translated?
whatTexts.text: The tool is suitable for any Cyrillic texts — from individual words to large paragraphs. It equally correctly processes names, surnames, brand names, website texts, and advertising materials. The result can be immediately copied and used in work.

forSpecialists.title: How is transliteration useful for specialists?
forSpecialists.text: For marketers, copywriters, and SEO specialists, transliteration is a way to save time and avoid errors when preparing texts. The automatic converter in Wekey Tools makes the process as fast and convenient as possible. One click is enough to get Latinized text ready for use in URLs, publications, or documents.

howToUse.title: How to use online transliteration?
howToUse.text: It's simple: enter text in Cyrillic, select the necessary options or leave the default settings and click "Show Result". The service instantly converts your text to transliteration, and the "Copy Result" button allows you to immediately transfer it to any other application.

seo.title: Remove Empty Lines Online - Wekey Tools
seo.description: Fast empty lines removal and text filtering by content. Powerful tool for cleaning and processing text data.
seo.keywords: remove empty lines, text filtering, text cleanup, line processing, text editor
seo.ogDescription: Remove empty lines and filter text by content with our online tool

whatIsEmptyLinesRemoval.title: What is empty lines removal?
whatIsEmptyLinesRemoval.text: Empty lines removal is the process of cleaning text from unnecessary line breaks and spaces that may appear when copying from different sources. This tool also allows filtering lines by content, removing or keeping only those lines that contain specific words or phrases.

whyNeeded.title: Why remove empty lines?
whyNeeded.text: Empty lines often appear when copying text from various sources: web pages, documents, tables. They clutter the text and can interfere with further data processing. Removing empty lines makes text more compact and convenient for analysis, especially when working with large data arrays.

howItWorks.title: How does the tool work?
howItWorks.text: The tool offers several operating modes: simple empty line removal, removing lines containing specific words, or removing lines NOT containing specific words. You can enter keywords separated by commas or on new lines. The tool processes text instantly and shows the number of lines before and after processing.

whatCanFilter.title: What types of filtering are available?
whatCanFilter.text: The tool supports three types of filtering: removing empty lines, removing lines containing specified words, and removing lines NOT containing specified words. This allows you to quickly extract the needed information from large texts or conversely, clean text from unwanted elements.

forSpecialists.title: Who will find this tool useful?
forSpecialists.text: The tool is especially useful for data analysts, copywriters, SEO specialists, and anyone working with text data. It will help quickly clean keyword lists, process data from tables, prepare content for publication, or extract needed information from large texts.

howToUse.title: How to use the tool?
howToUse.text: Paste your text into the input field, select the needed processing type: remove empty lines or set up content filtering. When using filters, specify keywords separated by commas or on separate lines. Click "Show Result" and copy the processed text.

seo.title: Add Symbols to Lines Online - Wekey Tools
seo.description: Fast addition of symbols to the beginning, end, or both places of text lines. Tool with exceptions support and batch processing.
seo.keywords: add symbols, prefix suffix, line processing, text editing, batch processing
seo.ogDescription: Add symbols to text lines with exceptions support and various placement modes

whatIsSymbolAdding.title: What is adding symbols to lines?
whatIsSymbolAdding.text: Adding symbols to lines is the process of automatically placing selected symbols or text at the beginning, end, or both places of each line of text. This tool is useful for formatting lists, adding prefixes and suffixes, creating bulleted lists, or preparing data for further processing.

whyNeeded.title: Why add symbols to lines?
whyNeeded.text: Adding symbols to lines is often required when working with data: creating lists with markers, adding numbers, formatting code, preparing content for CMS, creating SQL queries from value lists. Instead of manually editing each line, this tool allows you to perform the operation instantly for the entire text.

howItWorks.title: How does the symbol addition tool work?
howItWorks.text: The tool offers three operating modes: adding only to the beginning of the line, only to the end, or to both places simultaneously. You can specify any symbols to add and set exception words to which symbols will not be added. There's a ready-made set of service words that can be quickly transferred to the exceptions list.

whatCanProcess.title: What types of processing are available?
whatCanProcess.text: The tool supports adding any symbols: punctuation marks, brackets, quotes, numbers, list markers, HTML tags, and much more. You can add both single symbols and entire phrases. The exceptions system allows skipping certain words, which is especially useful when working with service words or special terms.

forSpecialists.title: Who will find this tool useful?
forSpecialists.text: The tool is especially useful for web developers, content managers, data analysts, copywriters, and anyone working with text lists. It will help quickly create bulleted lists, add HTML tags, prepare data for databases, format code, or create structured content.

howToUse.title: How to use the tool?
howToUse.text: Paste your text into the input field, specify the symbols you want to add, choose the placement mode (beginning, end, or both places). If necessary, add exception words or use the ready-made set of service words. Click "Show Result" and copy the processed text.

duplicateFinderTool.title: Duplicate Finder
duplicateFinderTool.description: Compare two lists to find unique and common elements

seo.title: Duplicate Finder Tool Online - Wekey Tools
seo.description: Free comparison of two lists to find unique and common elements. Tool with case sensitivity and detailed analytics.
seo.keywords: duplicate finder, list comparison, unique elements, common elements, data analysis
seo.ogDescription: Quick comparison of two lists to identify unique and common elements

whatIsDuplicateFinding.title: What is duplicate finding in lists?
whatIsDuplicateFinding.text: Duplicate finding is the process of comparing two data lists to identify unique elements in each list and common elements between them. The tool automatically analyzes both lists and provides detailed information about differences and similarities, helping with data analysis and decision-making.

whenToUse.title: When to use duplicate finder?
whenToUse.text: The tool is essential when comparing customer lists, analyzing keywords, checking databases for matches, comparing inventory, competitor analysis, or working with any list data. It helps quickly identify overlaps, find unique elements, and optimize workflows.

howItWorks.title: How does list comparison work?
howItWorks.text: The tool compares two uploaded lists line by line, automatically removing empty lines and optionally considering character case. Results are presented in three columns: elements unique to the first list, common elements, and elements unique to the second list with count for each category.

benefits.title: Benefits of online duplicate finding
benefits.text: Fast processing of large lists, clear presentation of results in three columns, ability to consider or ignore case, instant copying of results, counting elements in each category, and complete privacy - all data is processed locally in the browser.

forSpecialists.title: Who will find this tool useful?
forSpecialists.text: The tool is especially useful for data analysts, sales managers, marketers, database administrators, SEO specialists, and anyone working with list data. It will help quickly analyze customer databases, compare product lists, find keyword intersections, or identify unique elements for various business tasks.

howToUse.title: How to use the tool?
howToUse.text: Paste the first list in the left field, the second list in the right field. If necessary, enable case sensitivity option for precise comparison. Click "Find Duplicates" and get results in three columns. Use copy buttons to quickly save the needed data.

utmGeneratorTool.title: UTM Generator
utmGeneratorTool.description: Create UTM tags for tracking advertising campaign effectiveness

seo.title: UTM Generator Online - Wekey Tools
seo.description: Free UTM parameter generator for tracking advertising campaign effectiveness. Create correct UTM tags with transliteration.
seo.keywords: utm generator, utm tags, utm parameters, campaign tracking, traffic analytics, link generator
seo.ogDescription: Simple and convenient UTM parameter generator for marketing campaigns

whatIsUtm.title: What are UTM tags?
whatIsUtm.text: UTM tags (Urchin Tracking Module) are special parameters added to URLs for tracking traffic sources in web analytics. They allow you to accurately determine where visitors came to your site from: which advertising campaign, source, or specific ad.

whenToUse.title: When to use UTM tags?
whenToUse.text: UTM parameters are essential when launching advertising campaigns on social networks, contextual advertising, email campaigns, affiliate programs, and any marketing activities. They help measure ROI, optimize budgets, and make informed decisions about developing advertising channels.

howItWorks.title: How does the UTM generator work?
howItWorks.text: The tool automatically creates correct UTM parameters based on entered data. You specify the base URL and fill in the source, medium, campaign, term, and content fields. The generator creates the final link with properly encoded parameters and optionally applies transliteration for correct display in analytics.

benefits.title: UTM generator benefits
benefits.text: Automatic parameter encoding, built-in templates for popular advertising platforms, Cyrillic transliteration option, instant copying of ready links, support for all standard UTM parameters, and simple intuitive interface for quick work.

forSpecialists.title: Who will find this tool useful?
forSpecialists.text: The tool is especially useful for marketers, performance specialists, SMM managers, web analysts, affiliate marketers, and business owners. It will help set up correct tracking of advertising campaigns, measure channel effectiveness, and optimize marketing expenses.

howToUse.title: How to use the generator?
howToUse.text: Enter the base website URL, select traffic source from ready templates or enter manually. Fill in the needed UTM parameters: source, medium, campaign, term, and content. If necessary, enable transliteration and click "Show result".

seo.title: Random Number Generator Online - Wekey Tools
seo.description: Free random number generator in a specified range. Customizable number of results with option to exclude repeats.
seo.keywords: number generator, random numbers, random, lottery, number range, no repeats
seo.ogDescription: Simple and convenient random number generator with customizable range

whatIsNumberGenerator.title: What is a random number generator?
whatIsNumberGenerator.text: A random number generator is a tool for creating pseudo-random numbers in a specified range. It uses mathematical algorithms to generate a sequence of numbers that are statistically indistinguishable from truly random ones. The tool allows you to set minimum and maximum values, number of generated numbers, and option to exclude repeats.

whenToUse.title: When to use a number generator?
whenToUse.text: The generator is indispensable for conducting lotteries and giveaways, choosing random participants, creating test data, games and entertainment, statistical research, passwords and codes. It will help in any situation where fair randomness or quick generation of numeric values is needed.

howItWorks.title: How does the generator work?
howItWorks.text: The tool uses JavaScript's built-in pseudo-random number generator to create numbers in the specified range. You set the minimum and maximum values, number of needed numbers. With the 'No repeats' option enabled, each number can only be generated once, which is useful for giveaways and selecting unique elements.

benefits.title: Generator benefits
benefits.text: Quick generation of multiple numbers simultaneously, customizable range from any minimum to maximum value, no repeats option for unique results, current time display for documenting results, instant copying of results, and simple intuitive interface.

forSpecialists.title: Who will find this tool useful?
forSpecialists.text: The tool is especially useful for contest and giveaway organizers, teachers and students, software developers, data analysts, gamers and board game enthusiasts. It will help conduct fair drawings, create test data, select random samples, or add an element of randomness to any process.

howToUse.title: How to use the generator?
howToUse.text: Set the minimum value using the 'FROM' slider, set the maximum value with the 'TO' slider, choose the number of needed numbers. If necessary, enable the 'No repeats' option to get unique values. Click 'Show Result' and copy the generated numbers.

duplicateRemoval.description: Tool for removing duplicate lines from text
duplicateRemoval.keywords: duplicate removal, text cleanup, unique lines, list processing

whatIsDuplicateRemoval.title: What is duplicate removal?
whatIsDuplicateRemoval.text: Duplicate removal is the process of finding and eliminating repeated lines in text. Our tool allows you to clean lists of duplicate entries, leaving only unique elements.

whyNeeded.title: Why remove duplicates?
whyNeeded.text: Duplicates in lists can occur when merging data from different sources, input errors, or automatic generation. Removing them helps clean data, reduce file size, and improve information quality.

howItWorks.title: How does the tool work?
howItWorks.text: The tool analyzes each line of text and offers three processing modes: remove duplicates (keeps first occurrence), remove all duplicates (removes all repeating lines), and remove unique (keeps only lines with duplicates).

whatTexts.title: What texts can be processed?
whatTexts.text: Suitable for any lists: email addresses, names, phone numbers, keywords, URLs, product items, and other data where repetitions may occur.

forSpecialists.title: Who is this tool for?
forSpecialists.text: Marketers, data analysts, database administrators, SEO specialists, content managers, and anyone working with lists and arrays of text data.

howToUse.title: How to use?
howToUse.text: Paste or enter text with a list, select the desired duplicate removal mode, click 'Show result' and copy the cleaned list.

seo.title: Minus Words Processing Online - Wekey Tools
seo.description: Convenient tool for selecting and forming minus words list for contextual advertising
seo.keywords: minus words, contextual advertising, exclusions, negative keywords, Yandex Direct, Google Ads
seo.ogDescription: Quick minus words selection from text for contextual advertising setup

whatAreMinusWords.title: What are minus words?
whatAreMinusWords.text: Minus words (negative keywords) are words for which you don't want to show your ads. They help exclude irrelevant impressions, save budget and attract higher quality traffic. Properly selected minus words increase advertising campaign effectiveness.

whyNeeded.title: Why are minus words needed?
whyNeeded.text: Minus words protect from showing ads for non-target queries, reduce cost per click, increase CTR and conversion, save advertising budget. Without minus words, ads may show for inappropriate queries, leading to wasted spending and low campaign effectiveness.

howItWorks.title: How does the tool work?
howItWorks.text: The tool breaks down entered text into separate words, cleans them from punctuation and allows selecting needed words by clicking. Selected words are automatically added to minus words list, which can be copied and used in advertising systems.

whatTexts.title: What texts can be processed?
whatTexts.text: Suitable for processing any texts: search queries, product descriptions, thematic articles, competitor keyword lists, search query reports. The tool correctly processes texts in Cyrillic and Latin.

forSpecialists.title: Who is this tool useful for?
forSpecialists.text: Contextual advertising specialists, PPC managers, internet marketers, business owners, advertising agencies and everyone who sets up advertising in Yandex.Direct, Google Ads or other advertising systems.

howToUse.title: How to use the tool?
howToUse.text: Paste text with potential minus words, click 'Show result', click on words you want to add to minus words, and copy the ready list. Unnecessary words can be removed with the 'x' button.

matchTypes.description: Tool for formatting keywords for different match types in contextual advertising

seo.keywords: match types, keywords, advertising, Yandex Direct, Google Ads, broad match, phrase match, exact match
seo.ogDescription: Quick keyword formatting for contextual advertising with different match types

whatAreMatchTypes.title: What are match types?
whatAreMatchTypes.text: Match types are settings in contextual advertising that determine which search queries will trigger your ads. Broad match covers maximum queries, phrase match shows for the phrase and its variations, exact match only for specific queries.

whyNeeded.title: Why are match types needed?
whyNeeded.text: Proper use of match types helps control advertising reach and relevance. This allows you to save budget, increase CTR, reduce cost per click and improve traffic quality. Each type is suitable for different advertising campaign goals.

howItWorks.title: How does the tool work?
howItWorks.text: The tool automatically formats your keywords according to the selected match type. Broad match cleans words from special characters, phrase match adds quotes, exact match adds square brackets. Additionally, you can change text case.

whatKeywords.title: What keywords can be processed?
whatKeywords.text: Suitable for any keywords: single-word queries, long phrases, brand queries, geo-dependent keywords, commercial and informational queries. The tool correctly processes texts in Cyrillic and Latin.

forSpecialists.title: Who is this tool useful for?
forSpecialists.text: Contextual advertising specialists, PPC managers, marketers, business owners, internet marketing agencies and everyone who sets up advertising in Yandex.Direct, Google Ads or other advertising systems.

howToUse.title: How to use the tool?
howToUse.text: Paste a list of keywords, select the desired match type (broad, phrase or exact), if necessary select case change, click 'Show result' and copy the formatted keywords.

whatIsLineBreakRemoval.title: What is line break removal?
whatIsLineBreakRemoval.text: Line break removal is the process of merging multi-line text into a single line or paragraph. The tool removes line break characters and optionally replaces them with chosen symbols: spaces, punctuation marks, or custom characters.

whyNeeded.title: Why remove line breaks?
whyNeeded.text: Line break removal is necessary when copying text from PDF documents, tables, preparing text for social media, creating meta descriptions, forming keyword lists. It helps get clean, readable text without unnecessary breaks.

howItWorks.title: How does the tool work?
howItWorks.text: The tool splits text into lines, removes empty lines and merges remaining lines into one block. You can choose what to replace line breaks with: leave without replacement, add spaces, punctuation marks, or your own custom symbol.

whatTexts.title: What texts can be processed?
whatTexts.text: Suitable for any multi-line texts: articles copied from PDF, lists, table data, code, poems, addresses, technical descriptions. The tool correctly processes texts in any languages.

forSpecialists.title: Who is this tool useful for?
forSpecialists.text: Copywriters, content managers, SEO specialists, editors, students, researchers, site administrators and everyone who works with text content and needs quick formatting.

howToUse.title: How to use the tool?
howToUse.text: Paste multi-line text, select line break replacement option (nothing, space, punctuation marks or custom option), click 'Show result' and copy the processed text.

whatIsSpacesToParagraphs.title: What is spaces to paragraphs conversion?
whatIsSpacesToParagraphs.text: Spaces to paragraphs conversion is the process of replacing all spaces in text with line breaks, creating a separate paragraph from each word. This helps structure text, create lists, or prepare data for further processing.

whyNeeded.title: Why convert spaces to paragraphs?
whyNeeded.text: The tool is useful for creating lists from sentences, preparing keywords for advertising, formatting data for import, creating vertical lists, processing tags, and creating structured content from continuous text.

howItWorks.title: How does the conversion work?
howItWorks.text: The tool replaces all spaces and space groups with line break characters. Additionally, you can remove punctuation marks, special characters, convert to lowercase, or capitalize the first letter of each paragraph.

whatTexts.title: What texts can be processed?

forSpecialists.title: Who is this tool useful for?

howToUse.title: How to use the tool?

synonymGenerator.title: Synonym Generator
synonymGenerator.description: AI synonym generator with multi-language support
synonymGenerator.inputPlaceholder: Enter words or phrases (each on a new line)...

loading.title: Generating synonyms for your words.
loading.subtitle: This may take up to 1 minute.

errors.generic: An error occurred while generating synonyms

seo.title: AI Synonym Generator Online - Wekey Tools
seo.description: Smart AI synonym generator with support for Russian, Ukrainian and English languages
seo.keywords: synonym generator, AI synonyms, word alternatives, synonym finder, ChatGPT synonyms
seo.ogDescription: Advanced AI tool for generating synonyms in multiple languages
seo.whatIsSynonymGenerator: What is an AI synonym generator?
seo.whatIsSynonymGeneratorContent: An AI synonym generator is a modern online tool based on artificial intelligence and natural language processing technologies. Unlike simple synonym dictionaries, it doesn't just pick random alternatives, but considers the context in which a word or expression is used. Thanks to this, you get not only a list of possible replacements, but truly appropriate, accurate and stylistically suitable synonyms. This approach allows you to improve text readability, make it more lively, natural and convincing.
seo.whyNeeded: Why do you need a synonym generator
seo.whyNeededContent: Frequent repetition of the same words makes text monotonous and reduces its effectiveness — whether it's a blog article, product description or advertisement. The AI synonym generator helps solve this problem: it diversifies vocabulary, improves style and makes content more professional. The tool is especially useful for SEO, as search engines value texts with rich vocabulary where key queries are organically woven into the structure. The generator also helps copywriters create multiple versions of the same text, which is convenient for testing advertisements or social media posts.
seo.howItWorksContent: The tool is based on machine learning algorithms and neural networks trained on huge text corpora. The system analyzes the meaning of a word, its grammatical form and surrounding context. For example, the word 'key' can mean a tool, water source or solution to a problem. The generator determines which exact variant is needed and selects correct synonyms. This makes results more accurate and eliminates 'random' replacements characteristic of traditional dictionaries. As a result, you get a list of words that can be used in text without risk of distorting meaning.
seo.whatTextsContent: The AI synonym generator works with virtually all parts of speech: nouns, verbs, adjectives, adverbs, set phrases and even idioms. It is equally useful in everyday vocabulary and professional spheres — whether marketing, law, medicine or IT. For example, a marketer can find different variants for an advertising slogan, and a student can improve formulations in academic work. Support for different speech styles — from business to artistic — makes the tool a universal assistant for any tasks.
seo.forSpecialistsContent: The online generator will be an indispensable assistant for copywriters and SEO specialists who work with texts daily. Journalists and bloggers can use it to improve style and avoid repetitions. Translators — to find more precise words depending on context. Students and teachers — to diversify language in academic works and lectures. Marketers and advertisers can prepare multiple versions of ads and slogans for A/B testing. Writers and screenwriters will find a source of fresh ideas for artistic texts in the tool. Essentially, anyone who wants to write richer and more convincingly will find it useful.
seo.howToUseContent: Working with the tool is very simple: paste words or phrases into the input field (one per line), select the generation language and click the 'Show result' button. Within seconds, the system will suggest a list of synonyms selected considering meaning and style. You can quickly copy ready variants and use them in text — whether it's an article, social media post, advertisement or letter. Thanks to the simple interface, you can use the generator even without special knowledge — everything is intuitive and convenient.

seo.title: Split Text by Columns Online - Wekey Tools
seo.description: Convenient tool for splitting text into columns with configurable separators and exceptions
seo.keywords: text splitting, columns, separators, text processing, data parsing
seo.ogDescription: Efficient tool for structuring text into columns

whatIsTextByColumns.title: What is text splitting by columns?
whatIsTextByColumns.text: Text splitting by columns is the process of dividing structured text into separate columns using specified separators. The tool automatically distributes data from each line across 6 columns, simplifying the processing of lists, tables, and structured information.

whyNeeded.title: Why do you need column splitting?
whyNeeded.text: The tool is useful for processing CSV data, creating structured lists, analyzing imported data, preparing information for tables, separating product catalogs, processing export results, and structuring any data with separators.

howItWorks.title: How does text splitting work?
howItWorks.text: The system analyzes each line of text and splits it by the selected separator character (semicolon, comma, dot, space, or custom symbol). The resulting parts are distributed across 6 columns. You can set exceptions for lines that should not be split.

whatTexts.title: What texts can be processed?
whatTexts.text: Suitable for any structured data: CSV files, product lists, contact data, export results, tabular data, catalogs, price lists. Supports various separator formats and allows excluding headers and summary lines.

forSpecialists.title: Who benefits from this tool?
forSpecialists.text: Data analysts, content managers, marketers, online store administrators, database specialists, SEO specialists, and everyone who works with structured data and needs quick processing.

howToUse.title: How to use the tool?
howToUse.text: Paste structured text, select the appropriate separator (semicolon, comma, etc.), add exceptions for headers or totals if needed, click 'Show result' and get data split into 6 columns for convenient work.

textOptimizer.title: Text Optimizer
textOptimizer.description: Automatic text optimization with multiple settings

options.replaceMultipleSpaces: Replace double spaces with single spaces

seo.title: Text Optimizer Online - Wekey Tools
seo.description: Automatic text optimization with settings for spaces, capitalization, paragraphs and punctuation
seo.keywords: text optimization, text formatting, spaces, capitalization, paragraphs, punctuation
seo.ogDescription: Smart tool for automatic text optimization and formatting
seo.whatIsTextOptimizerContent: A text optimizer is a tool for automatically improving text formatting and structure. It fixes common errors: extra spaces, incorrect punctuation, letter case, creates proper paragraphs and makes text more readable and professional.
seo.whyNeeded: Why do you need text optimization?
seo.whyNeededContent: Optimization is necessary for creating quality content: fixing copy errors from various sources, preparing texts for publication, improving readability, meeting formatting standards and creating a professional impression on readers.
seo.howItWorksContent: The system analyzes text and applies selected rules: removes extra spaces at the beginning and end of lines, adds spaces after punctuation marks, replaces multiple spaces, fixes case after periods and creates proper paragraph structure.
seo.whatTextsContent: Suitable for any texts: articles, documents, social media posts, product descriptions, letters, technical texts. Especially useful for content copied from PDF, web pages or other sources with broken formatting.
seo.forSpecialistsContent: Copywriters, content managers, editors, journalists, bloggers, marketers, students, teachers, secretaries and everyone who works with text and strives for high-quality content formatting.
seo.howToUseContent: Paste text for optimization, select needed options (remove extra spaces, fix capitalization, create paragraphs, etc.) or use 'All of the above', click 'Show result' and get optimized text.

textSorting.title: Text and Lines Sorting
textSorting.description: Tool for sorting text by various criteria

seo.title: Text Sorting Online - Wekey Tools
seo.description: Convenient tool for sorting words and lines alphabetically, by length and word count
seo.keywords: text sorting, word sorting, line sorting, alphabetical sorting, sorting by length
seo.ogDescription: Fast text sorting by various criteria online
seo.whatIsTextSortingContent: Text sorting is a tool for arranging lines and words by various criteria: alphabetical order, text length or word count. Allows you to quickly organize large amounts of textual information in the desired order.
seo.whyNeededContent: Sorting is necessary for data organization: creating catalogs, ordering lists, content analysis, report preparation, database work and improving readability of large text arrays.
seo.howItWorksContent: The system analyzes each line of text and applies the selected sorting criterion: alphabetical order (direct or reverse), line length in characters, number of words in a line. The result is displayed in sorted form.
seo.whatTextsContent: Suitable for any lists: names, addresses, products, keywords, code lines, table data, search results. Especially useful for large lists requiring ordering.
seo.forSpecialistsContent: Data analysts, content managers, SEO specialists, programmers, researchers, database administrators, editors, marketers and anyone working with large volumes of textual information.
seo.howToUseContent: Paste text for sorting, select criteria (alphabetically, by line length or word count), specify sort order (ascending or descending), click 'Show result' and get sorted text.

seo.whatIsTextToHtml: What is a text to HTML converter?
seo.whatIsTextToHtmlContent:
A text to HTML converter is a tool for transforming plain text into HTML code with appropriate tags. Allows you to choose tag types: paragraph tags

only, line break tags
only, or mixed mode for creating proper HTML markup.
seo.whyNeededContent: Conversion is necessary for web development: creating HTML pages, preparing content for websites, formatting text for blogs, creating email newsletters, working with CMS and accelerating web page layout process.
seo.howItWorksContent:
The system analyzes text structure and applies selected HTML tags:

mode creates paragraphs for each text block,
mode adds line breaks, mixed mode combines both tag types for optimal markup.
seo.whatTextsContent: Suitable for any text: articles, news, blog posts, product descriptions, letters, documents, comments. Especially useful for content that needs to be placed on websites or in HTML documents.
seo.forSpecialistsContent: Web developers, layout designers, content managers, bloggers, copywriters, designers, marketers, site administrators and everyone who works with web content and HTML markup.
seo.howToUseContent:
Paste text for conversion, select HTML tag mode (only
